function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of resources in healthcare facilities due to existing COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare facilities, potential spread of contagious diseases, compromised patient care","Mitigation":"Increase hospital capacity, allocate additional human resources, provide adequate protective equipment","Technologies":"Telemedicine, telenursing, telepharmacy, telesurgery, remote clinical healthcare","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, hospital staff","Owner":"Healthcare administrations, government, hospital management"},{"Description":"Strict requirements and sophisticated underlying technologies for teleservices","Impact":"Inaccessible or ineffective healthcare services, compromised patient care, limited accessibility to healthcare","Mitigation":"Invest in advanced communication infrastructure, ensure technical expertise, regular maintenance of telecommunication technologies","Technologies":"4K/8K video streaming, low-latency and low jitter, high-speed internet, 5G technology","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, students, telecommunication experts","Owner":"Healthcare administrations, telecommunication companies, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Need to minimize the risk of healthcare professionals getting exposed to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare professional exposure, potential transmission of contagious diseases, compromised healthcare workforce","Mitigation":"Implement teleservices for remote healthcare delivery, reduce physical interaction, provide protective equipment, promote telemedicine","Technologies":"Telemedicine, telenursing, telepharmacy, telesurgery, remote healthcare services","People":"Healthcare professionals, hospital staff, patients","Owner":"Healthcare administrations, government, hospital management"}]}
